function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Construction labor developing health and safety concerns during the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Risk of disease transmission and impact on workforce productivity and well-being","Mitigation":"Implementation of health and safety guidelines and regulations","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, contact tracing tools","People":"Construction workers, laborers","Owner":"Construction companies, health and safety agencies"},{"Description":"Inadequate implementation of health and safety guidelines","Impact":"Increased risk of virus spread and higher potential for employee infections","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to updated guidelines and regulations, regular training and monitoring","Technologies":"Digital health and safety monitoring tools, compliance tracking systems","People":"Construction companies, health and safety agencies","Owner":"Construction companies, health and safety agencies"},{"Description":"Insufficient communication and awareness about health and safety guidelines","Impact":"Lack of understanding and compliance among construction workers, leading to higher risk of virus transmission","Mitigation":"Regular communication, training, and awareness programs","Technologies":"Communication platforms, training modules, digital signage","People":"Construction workers, laborers","Owner":"Construction companies, health and safety agencies"}]}
